data.text: @DowneastCider Can shaming is one of the worst things a human can do. The bigger problem here is that you continue to make summer blend when you could be making the hard lemonade.

@DowneastCider Are we drinking hard cider or your sisters lunch box apple juice?  Grow up and learn how to read the can so you can enjoy what’s inside cuz that stuff is amazing....  and I like the cans...  look at the competition...  they all look the same.... lame...  🍎🍺
@DowneastCider I would love to be repping that beautiful orange can in Albany, NY but can’t find it 😩
